headline: Deckers (DECK) Stock Falls Amid Market Uptick: What Investors Need to Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Deckers (DECK) stood at $103.07, denoting a -1.08% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: Can Deckers Offset Tariff Costs Through Pricing & Sourcing Shifts?
summary: DECK expects tariffs to drive up costs by $150M in fiscal 2026, forcing price hikes and margin pressure despite growth plans.
